header.title: Our Services
header.subtitle: Advanced vision correction solutions tailored to your needs

traditional.title: Traditional LASIK
traditional.description: Our standard LASIK procedure uses a microkeratome blade to create a thin flap in the cornea. This established technique offers excellent vision correction for nearsightedness, farsightedness, and astigmatism with a quick recovery time.

custom.title: Custom Bladeless LASIK
custom.description: Our premium all-laser LASIK procedure creates a corneal flap using a femtosecond laser instead of a blade. This advanced technique allows for more precise corneal mapping and customized treatment, resulting in better outcomes for patients with complex prescriptions.

prk.title: PRK (Photorefractive Keratectomy)
prk.description: PRK is an excellent alternative for patients who aren't candidates for LASIK. Instead of creating a flap, PRK removes the outer layer of the cornea before reshaping, making it suitable for patients with thin corneas or certain corneal abnormalities.

presbyopia.title: Presbyopia Correction
presbyopia.description: We offer specialized procedures to address age-related near vision loss (presbyopia). These treatments can reduce or eliminate dependence on reading glasses through monovision LASIK or advanced lens-based solutions.
